title: background transparency
content: I'm new to Firefox, and I am not sure how to make my homepage transparent to see my theme in full, if it is possible. How do I do this?
creator: carsforever15

title: How do I combine/merge two similar but different boookmark lists?
content: I trying to combine two similar but different boookmark lists on my Firefox browser but haven't been able to find a working solution. I could use some good advice where I don't need to download any sort of app.
creator: cfduque

title: Open local MS-Access database with Firefox 120
content:
Hello to everybody, My question: Opening local .mdb files (MS Access database) does no longer work in Firefox 120, but was ok in previous releases. The only choice is to save the file rather than onening it with MS access. Under Firefox settings/applications the file type .mdb does not appear. If I answer the question "What should Firefox do with other files?" with "Ask whether to open or save files" it has no effect at all. I expect to find an entry for .mdb files where to choose "always ask" as was the case earlier. Please help!

Regards Volker Zipp
creator: vozi

title: Is there a way to NOT sync a specific domain?
content:
Hello

I use bing just to search a certain amount of things for microsoft rewards, but i don't want to see these searches on my browser history when i use firefox in another device, is there a way to not sync pages from bing.com ?
creator: Javonetor
